name: Nammu
description:
A game made at KADK during the art direction weeks.

Group:

Alex - Lead artist

Lucas - Lead designer/ Creative director

Simon - 3D artist

Johannes - 3D artist

Xinru - Art director

Sophie - Concept artist

  • A trading outpost on one of the few bodies of land remaining in the region that used to be Denmark.
  • Partly situated on top of huge heaps of ancient structures and slowly corroding junk from the times before the fall of civilization.
  • A network of floating platforms and boats surround the center of the community.
  • Most people seek towards the remaining landmasses of the world, however - there are many opportunities that arise from living in the water zones.
